name: CaN yOu HeAr Me? (itch) (PixelFr0ggie)
description:
Description:

"Ring ... ring ... I'm sorry no one is available to take your call. Please leave a message after the beep ... BEEP"

CaN yOu HeAr Me? is a game about 2 kids, Potato and Sausage, trying to communicate with each other amidst the noisy backdrop of every day life.

This game was made in conjunction with SEA Game Jam 2020.

Date: November,  2020

Duration: 5 days

Creds: 

1. Justin Oon (Designer)

2. Tan Jia Hui (Artist)

3. Me (Programmer)

__________

Controls:

W, A, S, D   -   Player 1 Move

Space   -   Player 1 Jump 

Arrows   -   Player 2 Move

Right Ctrl   -   Player 2 Jump
